/usr/bin/clang++-4.0    -std=c++14 -Wall -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/appbase_example.dir/main.cpp.o  -o appbase_example -rdynamic ../libappbase.a -ldl /root/opt/boost/lib/libboost_thread.a /root/opt/boost/lib/libboost_date_time.a /root/opt/boost/lib/libboost_filesystem.a /root/opt/boost/lib/libboost_system.a /root/opt/boost/lib/libboost_chrono.a /root/opt/boost/lib/libboost_program_options.a /root/opt/boost/lib/libboost_unit_test_framework.a /root/opt/boost/lib/libboost_locale.a -lpthread
